item.title: Coriander chutney
item.description: This chutney goes well with Bengali rice porridge with lentils and chicken. Recipe derived from Sohla El-Waylly at Serious Eats. Ingredients 1/2 bunch coriander, finely chopped 2 Thai green chiles, finely chopped 2 tablespoons (30 mL) lime juice 2 tablespoons (30 mL) olive oil Instructions Combine all the ingredients.
